hibernate-mapping.query:
from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory left join fetch i.softwareLpar.softwareLparEff
where i.softwareLpar.customer = :customer and i.softwareLpar.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID' and i.software.kbDefinition.deleted != 1 and i.software.productInfo.licensable = true and i.software.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory.softwareCategoryName = 'Operating Systems'
order by i.softwareLpar.name

from MsInstalledSoftwareBaseline m
join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.pod join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.industry join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.industry.sector join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.customerType join fetch m.software join fetch m.software.productInfo.softwareCategory
left join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.misldAccountSettings left join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType left join fetch m.software.microsoftProductMap
where m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.pod.podName = :podName

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory left join fetch i.software.microsoftProductMap
where i.softwareLpar.customer = :customer and i.software.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID'
order by i.softwareLpar.name

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory left join fetch i.installedSoftwareEff
where i.softwareLpar.customer = :customer and i.softwareLpar.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.software.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and i.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID' and i.software.kbDefinition.deleted != 1 and i.software.productInfo.licensable = true and i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory.status = 'ACTIVE'
order by i.softwareLpar.name

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory left join fetch i.installedSoftwareEff left join fetch i.softwareLpar.softwareLparEff
where i.softwareLpar.customer = :customer and i.softwareLpar.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID' and i.software.kbDefinition.deleted != 1 and i.software.productInfo.licensable = true and i.software.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory.status = 'ACTIVE'
order by i.softwareLpar.name

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory left join fetch i.installedSoftwareEff
where i.id = :id

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory left join fetch i.installedSoftwareEff
where i.softwareLpar = :id and i.software.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID'

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.discrepancyType join fetch i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory
where i.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar and i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory = :softwareCategory and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID'
from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i where i.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar and i.software = :software and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID'

from MsInstalledSoftwareBaseline m
join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline join fetch m.software join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.pod join fetch m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.customerType
where m.software.softwareItem.name = 'No Operating System' and m.msHardwareBaseline.status = 'ACTIVE' and m.status = 'ACTIVE'
order by m.msHardwareBaseline.customer.pod.podName, m.msHardwareBaseline.nodeName
from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i where i.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar and i.software = :software

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.InstalledSoftware i
join fetch i.softwareLpar join fetch i.software join fetch i.software.productInfo
where i.softwareLpar.customer = :customer and i.softwareLpar = :softwareLpar and i.status = 'ACTIVE' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'FALSE HIT' and i.discrepancyType.name != 'INVALID' and i.software.kbDefinition.deleted != 1 and i.software.productInfo.licensable = true and i.software.manufacturer.manufacturerName = 'MICROSOFT' and i.software.productInfo.softwareCategory = :softwareCategory and i.software.productInfo.priority < :priority
